00023 #include <avr/io.h>
00024 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00025 #include <stdio.h>
00026 #include <string.h>

00034 void bus_usart_init(unsigned int baudrate) {
00035         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_DRIVER_UNIT
00036                 /* Set baud rate */
00037                 UBRRH = (unsigned char) (baudrate>>8);
00038                 UBRRL = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00039 
00040                 UCSRA = 0;
00041 
00042                 /* Set frame format: 8data, no parity & 1 stop bits */
00043                 UCSRC = (1<< URSEL) | (0<<UMSEL) | (0<<UPM1) | (0<<UPM0) | (0<<USBS) | (1<<UCSZ1) | (1<<UCSZ0);
00044                 /* Enable receiver and transmitter */
00045                 UCSRB = (1<<RXEN) | (1<<TXEN) | (1<<RXCIE) | (1<<TXCIE);
00046         #endif
00047         
00048         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_POWERMETER_PICKUP
00049                 /* Set baud rate */
00050                 UBRRH = (unsigned char) (baudrate>>8);
00051                 UBRRL = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00052 
00053                 UCSRA = 0;
00054 
00055                 /* Set frame format: 8data, no parity & 1 stop bits */
00056                 UCSRC = (1<< URSEL) | (0<<UMSEL) | (0<<UPM1) | (0<<UPM0) | (0<<USBS) | (1<<UCSZ1) | (1<<UCSZ0);
00057                 /* Enable receiver and transmitter */
00058                 UCSRB = (1<<RXEN) | (1<<TXEN) | (1<<RXCIE) | (1<<TXCIE);
00059         #endif
00060 
00061                 
00062         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_DRIVER_UNIT_V2
00063                 /* Set baud rate */
00064                 UBRR1H = (unsigned char) (baudrate>>8);
00065                 UBRR1L = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00066 
00067                 UCSR1A = 0;
00068 
00069                 /* Set frame format: 8data, no parity & 1 stop bits */
00070                 UCSR1C = (1<<UCSZ11) | (1<<UCSZ10) | (0<<UCSZ12);
00071                 /* Enable receiver and transmitter */
00072                 UCSR1B = (1<<RXEN1) | (1<<TXEN1) | (1<<RXCIE1) | (1<<TXCIE1);
00073         #endif
00074 
00075         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_GENERAL_IO
00076                 /* Set baud rate */
00077                 UBRR1H = (unsigned char) (baudrate>>8);
00078                 UBRR1L = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00079 
00080                 UCSR1A = 0;
00081 
00082                 /* Set frame format: 8data, no parity & 1 stop bits */
00083                 UCSR1C = (1<<UCSZ11) | (1<<UCSZ10) | (0<<UCSZ12);
00084                 /* Enable receiver and transmitter */
00085                 UCSR1B = (1<<RXEN1) | (1<<TXEN1) | (1<<RXCIE1) | (1<<TXCIE1);
00086         #endif
00087 
00088         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_ROTATOR_UNIT
00089                 /* Set baud rate */
00090                 UBRR1H = (unsigned char) (baudrate>>8);
00091                 UBRR1L = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00092 
00093                 UCSR1A = 0;
00094 
00095                 /* Set frame format: 8data, no parity & 1 stop bits */
00096                 UCSR1C = (1<<UCSZ11) | (1<<UCSZ10) | (0<<UCSZ12);
00097                 /* Enable receiver and transmitter */
00098                 UCSR1B = (1<<RXEN1) | (1<<TXEN1) | (1<<RXCIE1) | (1<<TXCIE1);
00099         #endif
00100                 
00101         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_MAIN_FRONT_UNIT
00102                 /* Set baud rate */
00103                 UBRR2H = (unsigned char) (baudrate>>8);
00104                 UBRR2L = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00105                 /* Set frame format: 8data, no parity & 1 stop bits */
00106                 UCSR2C = (1<<UCSZ21) | (1<<UCSZ20) | (0<<UCSZ22);
00107                 /* Enable receiver and transmitter */
00108                 UCSR2B = (1<<RXEN2) | (1<<TXEN2) | (1<<RXCIE2) | (1<<TXCIE2);
00109         #endif
00110 }
00111 
00116 unsigned char bus_usart_transmit(unsigned char  data) {
00117         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_DRIVER_UNIT
00118                 /* Wait for empty transmit buffer */
00119                 while (!( UCSRA & (1<<UDRE)));
00120                 /* Put data into buffer, sends the data */
00121                 UDR = data;
00122         #endif
00123 
00124         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_POWERMETER_PICKUP
00125                 /* Wait for empty transmit buffer */
00126                 while (!( UCSRA & (1<<UDRE)));
00127                 /* Put data into buffer, sends the data */
00128                 UDR = data;
00129         #endif
00130                 
00131         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_DRIVER_UNIT_V2
00132                 /* Wait for empty transmit buffer */
00133                 while (!( UCSR1A & (1<<UDRE1)));
00134                 /* Put data into buffer, sends the data */
00135                 UDR1 = data;
00136         #endif
00137 
00138         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_GENERAL_IO
00139                 /* Wait for empty transmit buffer */
00140                 while (!( UCSR1A & (1<<UDRE1)));
00141                 /* Put data into buffer, sends the data */
00142                 UDR1 = data;
00143         #endif
00144 
00145 
00146         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_ROTATOR_UNIT
00147                 /* Wait for empty transmit buffer */
00148                 while (!( UCSR1A & (1<<UDRE1)));
00149                 /* Put data into buffer, sends the data */
00150                 UDR1 = data;
00151         #endif
00152                 
00153         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_MAIN_FRONT_UNIT
00154                 /* Wait for empty transmit buffer */
00155                 while (!( UCSR2A & (1<<UDRE2)));
00156                 /* Put data into buffer, sends the data */
00157                 UDR2 = data;
00158         #endif
00159         
00160         return 0;
00161 }
00162 
00168 unsigned char bus_usart_sendstring(char *data,unsigned char length) {
00169         int i;
00170         for (i=0;i<length;i++)
00171                 bus_usart_transmit(*(data++));
00172         
00173         return 0;
00174 }
00175 
00181 unsigned char bus_usart_receive(void ) {
00182         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_DRIVER_UNIT
00183                 /* Wait for data to be received */
00184                 while (!(UCSRA & (1<<RXC)));
00185                 /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00186                 return UDR;
00187         #endif
00188 
00189         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_POWERMETER_PICKUP
00190                 /* Wait for data to be received */
00191                 while (!(UCSRA & (1<<RXC)));
00192                 /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00193                 return UDR;
00194         #endif
00195                 
00196         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_DRIVER_UNIT_V2
00197                 /* Wait for data to be received */
00198                 while (!(UCSR1A & (1<<RXC1)));
00199                 /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00200                 return UDR1;
00201         #endif
00202 
00203         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_GENERAL_IO
00204                 /* Wait for data to be received */
00205                 while (!(UCSR1A & (1<<RXC1)));
00206                 /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00207                 return UDR1;
00208         #endif
00209                 
00210         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_ROTATOR_UNIT
00211                 /* Wait for data to be received */
00212                 while (!(UCSR1A & (1<<RXC1)));
00213                 /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00214                 return UDR1;
00215         #endif          
00216 
00217         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_MAIN_FRONT_UNIT
00218                 /* Wait for data to be received */
00219                 while (!(UCSR2A & (1<<RXC2)));
00220                 /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00221                 return UDR2;
00222         #endif
00223                 
00224         return(0);
00225 }

00232 unsigned char bus_usart_receive_loopback(void ) {
00233         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_DRIVER_UNIT
00234                 uint8_t rbuff;
00235                 /* Wait for data to be received */
00236                 while (!(UCSRA & (1<<RXC)));
00237                 /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00238                 rbuff = UDR;
00239                 bus_usart_transmit(rbuff);
00240                 return rbuff;
00241         #endif
00242 
00243         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_POWERMETER_PICKUP
00244                 uint8_t rbuff;
00245                 /* Wait for data to be received */
00246                 while (!(UCSRA & (1<<RXC)));
00247                 /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00248                 rbuff = UDR;
00249                 bus_usart_transmit(rbuff);
00250                 return rbuff;
00251         #endif
00252                 
00253         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_DRIVER_UNIT_V2
00254                 uint8_t rbuff;
00255                 /* Wait for data to be received */
00256                 while (!(UCSR1A & (1<<RXC1)));
00257                 /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00258                 rbuff = UDR1;
00259                 bus_usart_transmit(rbuff);
00260                 return rbuff;
00261         #endif
00262 
00263         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_GENERAL_IO
00264                 uint8_t rbuff;
00265                 /* Wait for data to be received */
00266                 while (!(UCSR1A & (1<<RXC1)));
00267                 /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00268                 rbuff = UDR1;
00269                 bus_usart_transmit(rbuff);
00270                 return rbuff;
00271         #endif
00272 
00273         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_ROTATOR_UNIT
00274                 uint8_t rbuff;
00275                 /* Wait for data to be received */
00276                 while (!(UCSR1A & (1<<RXC1)));
00277                 /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00278                 rbuff = UDR1;
00279                 bus_usart_transmit(rbuff);
00280                 return rbuff;
00281         #endif
00282                 
00283         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_MAIN_FRONT_UNIT
00284                 uint8_t rbuff;
00285                 /* Wait for data to be received */
00286                 while (!(UCSR2A & (1<<RXC2)));
00287                 /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00288                 rbuff = UDR2;
00289                 bus_usart_transmit(rbuff);
00290                 return rbuff;
00291         #endif
00292 
00293         return(0);
00294 }

00301 unsigned char bus_poll_usart_receive(void ) {
00302         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_DRIVER_UNIT
00303                 /* Check if data is received */
00304                 return ((UCSRA & (1<<RXC)));
00305         #endif
00306 
00307         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_POWERMETER_PICKUP
00308                 /* Check if data is received */
00309                 return ((UCSRA & (1<<RXC)));
00310         #endif
00311                 
00312         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_DRIVER_UNIT_V2
00313                 /* Check if data is received */
00314                 return ((UCSR1A & (1<<RXC1)));
00315         #endif
00316 
00317         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_GENERAL_IO
00318                 /* Check if data is received */
00319                 return ((UCSR1A & (1<<RXC1)));
00320         #endif
00321 
00322         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_ROTATOR_UNIT
00323                 /* Check if data is received */
00324                 return ((UCSR1A & (1<<RXC1)));
00325         #endif          
00326                 
00327         #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_MAIN_FRONT_UNIT
00328                 /* Check if data is received */
00329                 return ((UCSR2A & (1<<RXC2)));
00330         #endif
00331                 
00332         return (0);
00333 }
